header.title: Heimdal communication channels
header.text: Where to find developer and users

content.p: Progress reports and new development are reported now and then on the developer blog.
There are two mailings lists: heimdal-announce and heimdal-discuss (ml-archive, mail-archive, gmane).

Bug reports can be submitted via the <a href="https://github.com/heimdal/heimdal/issues/>GitHub's Heimdal Issues page. Security sensitive bug reports should be sent to heimdal-bugs@h5l.org using this PGP key (key id 3B81827E).
The developers are sometimes available on freenode's #heimdal channel.
